resources.string: CharacterBuilder is designed to build 2 different characters by adding points to their 3 main stats (Strength, Agility, Inteligence). Each point increase different attributes (HP, Attack, Shield and Magic). Points are bougth with gold (do not worry, you somehow have unlimited gold). The storyline is based on 2 stages (you can add points in Late game only after full assigning the Mid Game points). Further app development will have a special focus on each stage of the game. Enjoy!
